name: Notion Journal Template
description: This minimalistic journal system is set up to make it easy to start your journey into journaling and self-reflection in Notion. It can help you keep track of your mood over time and lead you through gratitude sessions!Quickly create new entries and organize them in Notion's databaseRecord your mood with each entryDon't know what to write? Start with a prompted entry!Comes with a gratitude worksheet templatePart of the Notion life coaching tools series (more coming soon!)To copy and modify this t
features: Quickly create new entries and organize them in Notion's database; Record your mood with each entry; Don't know what to write? Start with a prompted entry!; Comes with a gratitude worksheet template
